name: preceptoria-v2
description: Preceptoria V2 - A comprehensive preceptorship management system

scripts.dev: concurrently "bun run --cwd packages/server dev" "bun run --cwd packages/web dev"
scripts.build: bun run --cwd packages/server build && bun run --cwd packages/web build
scripts.test: bun run --cwd packages/server test && bun run --cwd packages/web test
scripts.install:all: bun install && bun run --cwd packages/server install && bun run --cwd packages/web install
